output.sentences: All the men and women in the house were so bored that they decided to exercise.
Everyone that is, except the twins who dressed like angels and decorated the room to look like heaven.
Dan The Big Buff Man stared at the twins with contempt.
A woman was so annoyed with everyone that she decided to take her mattress somewhere private .
Her friends came in with a sandwhich in hopes of consoling her.
